Title: Key-Stone
Text:
Glóin discovered the secret entrance to the inner keep of Gundabad, but the way is locked and will require an artifact of the old days.
The dwarf-vault that contains the key-stone is south of Rivendell, near the source of the Bruinen. Glóin is at his camp north of Rivendell at the east-end of the pass that leads through the Misty Mountains.

Glóin has asked you to retrieve a key-stone from an old dwarf-vault. The key-stone will allow you entry into the Dourhand-occupied dwarf-keep.

Lore: §6Almost forgotton, this is the "Key" to opening a secret entrance
display.Name: §3Key-Stone

CompleteText: Yes, yes, this is the key-stone of which I spoke! Good work, @p! Now the real business will begin.
